name: CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: ["main"]

jobs:
  build:
    # Use 'uses' with a path to your local workflow file to mimic 'include'
    uses: ./.github/workflows/ci.yml

  test:
    needs: build
    uses: ./.github/workflows/test.yml

  deploy:
    needs: test
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
    uses: ./.github/workflows/cd.yml
